heading: Content Block 2
summary: ALIAT AssociationALIAT Association organizes unique workshops (in Ukrainian and Russian) for Ukrainian adults to openly discuss the trauma of war and how the effects on well-being and mental health can be more easily managed.The workshops take place everyWednesdayat the Aliat Clinic (Ioan Cuza Boulevard, 5A) andFridaysat the Sante Clinic, and to sign up you can contact the team at the email addressinside@aliatong.ro.
